scenario.sendRequestSIP:
MESSAGE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[HardAddressUAS]> From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[InviteBranchId] Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] MESSAGE Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, PRACK Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Content-Type: application/vnd.poc.group-advertisement+xml Content-Length: x
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><group-advertisement xmlns="urn:oma:params:xml:ns:poc:group-advertisement" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:oma:params:xml:ns:poc:group-advertisement"> <note>Hello, this is my message</note> <group> <type>"dialed-out"</type> <display-name>null</display-name> <uri>sip:blablabla</uri> </group> </group-advertisement>
